settings.heading: Make A Good Impression
settings.html: Some HTML content

• Box One
    Creating your tray
  • Box Two
    Whitening your teeth

settings.content: Learn the science behind teeth whitening and how each person’s journey to white teeth are unique to themselves. We’re here to educate you and support you on how to use our range of products to get the best result and whitest smile.
settings.html: Some HTML content

• 2 x Impression Trays (for upper and lower arch)
  • 3 x Base Putties (white)
  • 3 x Catalyst Putties (green)
  • 1 x Set of Gloves
  • 1 x Prepaid Shipping Envelope
  • 1 x Instructions of the Inside Lid of Box
Looking for Box 2?

Time Required:
2 mins
You will need:
Mouth, Hands & Impression Trays

Grab one of the impression trays and check the size by putting it in your mouth. If it's too snug or big on your teeth, contact us at myorder@lumossmile.com and we’ll rush out a better fitting set.

PS. Don’t worry about the trays covering your wisdom teeth.

Lumos Tip

Before you take your impressions, check out what a good and bad impression looks like so you make a great first impression.

View Impression Examples
Some HTML content
Previous Step

Time Required:
3 mins
You will need:
Toothbrush, Toothpaste, & Floss

We’re here to make sure you make a great first impression, this ensures accurate custom-fit trays, and accurate trays mean happier smiles!

Brush & Floss

Make sure your teeth are freshly scrubbed and flossed.

Clean hands & Glove up

Wash and dry your hands before putting on your gloves.

Timer

Get a timer ready to keep your impressions on track.

Towel

It’s not pretty, but you may drool when you take your impressions out.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

Time Required:
30 Seconds
You will need:
A tray, 1 white putty, 1 green putty

The idea of taking teeth impressions might seem like a foreign concept, but don’t worry, you got this.

Start out by making your top impression.

The putty mixture will begin to set in 60 seconds. Once you begin mixing you have to work fast, then immediately place the mold in your mouth.

To start, put your gloves on and start blending the putties.

First, mix one container of white putty with one container of green putty until it’s one solid shade of light green without any white streaks.

Roll the mixture into a 4-inch long cylindrical shape, it should form a horseshoe shape.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

Time Required:
10 seconds
You will need:
Mixed Putty in a Tray

Place the putty into the tray and gently push down on the putty until it is fully on the tray.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

settings.section_sub_heading: Place The Putty In Your Tray

settings.html:
Time Required:
2:45 mins
You will need:
Towel

Line up your front teeth with the front of the tray.

Bite down on the putty, using your thumbs to push the tray into place.

Keep pushing until your teeth touch the tray and the putty slightly overlaps your gum line.

Your lip should come over both the putty and the tray.

Leave everything in place for 2:30 minutes, then pull the sides of the tray to remove the tray from your mouth.
Some HTML content
Previous Step

settings.content: Check your impressions to make sure your putty is fully mixed, gumline is present, a single imprint, and your molars are captured.
